Dockerfile.njk:
# Use official node image as the base image
FROM {{ node_image }} as build
WORKDIR /app
COPY package*.json ./
RUN npm install
COPY . .
RUN npm run build

# Use official nginx image as the base image
FROM {{ nginx_image }}
COPY --from=build /app/dist/{{ project_name }}/browser /usr/share/nginx/html
EXPOSE {{ port }}
CMD ["nginx", "-g", "daemon off;"]
